Module com.example.organizer
Package com.bookclub.service

Class BookProgressService

java.lang.Object
com.bookclub.service.BookProgressService
public class BookProgressService extends Object
The BookProgressService class provides a service layer to manage the user's progress in reading books. It interacts with the IBookProgressAO data access object to perform actions like starting, saving, and finishing book progress.

This is a singleton class. It should be initialized once via initialize() before use.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static BookProgressService getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the BookProgressService.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the BookProgressService
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the service is not initialized

    • initialize

      public static void initialize(com.bookclub.iao.IBookProgressAO bookProgressAO)
      Initializes the BookProgressService with the provided IBookProgressAO. This method must be called before any operations are performed.
      Parameters:
      bookProgressAO - the data access object for book progress management

    • getBookProgress

      public BookProgress getBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Retrieves the progress of a specific book for a given user.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose progress is being retrieved
      user - the user whose progress is being retrieved
      Returns:
      the BookProgress object if found, otherwise null

    • hasBookProgress

      public boolean hasBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Checks if the user has started the book progress for a specific book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book being checked
      user - the user being checked
      Returns:
      true if the user has started the book, otherwise false

    • startBookProgress

      public boolean startBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Starts a new book progress entry for the user with an initial page number of 0.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to start progress on
      user - the user who is starting the progress
      Returns:
      true if the progress was successfully started, otherwise false

    • finishBookProgress

      public boolean finishBookProgress(Book book, User user)
      Finishes and removes the user's book progress for the given book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to finish
      user - the user who is finishing the progress
      Returns:
      true if the progress was successfully finished, otherwise false

    • saveBookProgress

      public boolean saveBookProgress(Book book, User user, int pageNumber)
      Saves the user's current page progress for a specific book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose progress is being saved
      user - the user saving the progress
      pageNumber - the current page number the user is on
      Returns:
      true if the progress was saved successfully, otherwise false

    • getBookProgressListForBook

      public List<BookProgress> getBookProgressListForBook(Book book)
      Retrieves a sorted list of all users' progress for a specific book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book whose progress is being retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of BookProgress entries sorted by page number
